snippet.textDisplay:
My brother went in to Intensive Care unit on the 6th December 2021 and today is 24th January 2022 he had the corona few days later developed Covid-pneumonia and 4 weeks later caught hospital infection. He has very bad lungs and on kidney filters he almost died 3 times. Never smoked and maybe had cocktails once in a moon, eat healthy, exercised also had 2 vaccines. only 38 years old with no chronicle illness. We still don't understand how he got it this bad.. he is still fighting. please pray for my brother
Today is 30th March 2022 and my brother is out of Intensive care ❤  however he is still in hospital, developed bed pressure wounds grade 4 due to been still in bed for so long in intensive care. He has lost sense in his legs and has nerve damage on his feet due to muscle lost because of no movement during intensive care. He is alive! He went through it so if you have loved ones who is suffering don't lose hope please 🙏  keep praying
